artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: 3/8" horiz. strips of leather woven alternately with smooth and split side of hide on face. Olive warp. 1/8-3/8" cream, green & tan leather strips divided by tan threads form weft. Stapled to 8.5x11" card. "H-3" printed on card. (olive, tan, cream)
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc. %2F Leather Cloth%2C Jack Larsen%2C 1956
title: Leather Cloth
